description:
Query strings for each style:
- classic/2003: version=classic
- megacity: version=megacity&width=150
- neomatrixology: version=neomatrixology&width=150
- operator/throwback/1999: version=operator&width=150
- nightmare: version=nightmare&width=150
- paradise: version=paradise&width=150
- resurrections/updated/2021: version=resurrections&width=150
- trinity: version=trinity&width=150
- morpheus: version=morpheus&width=150
- bugs: version=bugs&width=150
- palimpsest: version=palimpsest&width=150
- twilight :version=twilight&width=150
- holoplay: version=holoplay&width=150
- 3D: version=3d&width=150

Set 150 as default width (e.g. number of columns) for a sane default on a single monitor, but you can tweak around to your liking.

Project code can be found here (along with all the other possible parameters and their descriptions): https://github.com/Rezmason/matrix
title: Configurable Matrix Rain
